results.title: Optimal statin use for prevention of sepsis in type 2 diabetes mellitus
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_pitavastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C108475 @@@Pitavastatin@@@ exerted the strongest protective effect on @<m>DISEASE_Sepsis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@, followed by @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Fluvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077340 @@@fluvastatin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Sun M, Tao Y, Chen WM, Wu SY, Zhang J. Optimal statin use for prevention of sepsis in type 2 diabetes mellitus Diabetol Metab Syndr. 2023 Apr 19;15(1):75. PMID: 37072863
citations.BibTeX: @article{37072863, title={Optimal statin use for prevention of sepsis in type 2 diabetes mellitus}, author={Sun M and Tao Y and Chen WM and Wu SY and Zhang J}, journal={Diabetol Metab Syndr}, volume={15}, number={1}, pages={75}}

results.title: Simvastatin Prevents Liver Microthrombosis and Sepsis Induced Coagulopathy in a Rat Model of Endotoxemia
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Prevents @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@Liver Microthrombosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Sepsis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@Sepsis@@@ Induced @DISEASE_Blood_Coagulation_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001778 @@@Coagulopathy@@@ in a @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rat@@@ Model of @DISEASE_Endotoxemia @DISEASE_MESH:D019446 @@@Endotoxemia@@@

results.title: Amelioration of Endotoxin-Induced Acute Lung Injury and Alveolar Epithelial Cells Apoptosis by Simvastatin Is Associated with Up-Regulation of Survivin/NF-kB/p65 Pathway
results.text_hl: A model of @DISEASE_Acute_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055371 @@@ALI@@@ was induced within experimental @<m>DISEASE_Sepsis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@ developed by intraperitoneal injection of a single non-lethal @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@ dose after short-term @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ pretreatment (10-40 mg/kg orally).

results.title: Simvastatin inhibits the inflammation and oxidative stress of human neutrophils in sepsis via autophagy induction.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ exerts a protective effect during @<m>DISEASE_Sepsis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Sepsis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@SP@@@) in animal models; however, the underlying mechanism is not completely understood, particularly in @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Sepsis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@SP@@@.

results.title: Pretreatment of simvastatin on liver trace element levels during endotoxemia.
results.text_hl: There are a few studies which investigated effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on elements in @<m>DISEASE_Sepsis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@.

results.title: Pre-treatment and continuous administration of simvastatin during sepsis improve metabolic parameters and prevent CNS injuries in survivor rats.
results.text_hl: Pre-treatment and continuous administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ during @<m>DISEASE_Sepsis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@ improve metabolic parameters and prevent @DISEASE_Central_Nervous_System_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D002494 @@@CNS injuries@@@ in survivor @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Determination of trace elements and electrolyte levels in kidney tissue of simvastatin-treated septic rats.
results.text_hl: In @<m>DISEASE_Sepsis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@ treated with the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@) group, @CHEMICAL_Trace_Elements @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014131 @@@trace elements@@@ and electrolyte levels are like the control groups, apart from @CHEMICAL_Selenium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012643 @@@selenium@@@ levels.

citations.NLM: Ates G, Tamer S, Ozkok E, Yorulmaz H, Yalcin IE, Demir G. Determination of trace elements and electrolyte levels in kidney tissue of simvastatin-treated septic rats. Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol. 2023 Nov 15;():. PMID: 37966573

results.title: [Endothelial protective effect of simvastatin on coagulation system in septic rats].
results.text_hl: Compared with the @<m>DISEASE_Sepsis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@ group, the plasma levels of @GENE_PCLAF @GENE_300795 @@@PAF@@@ in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ intervention group at 1 h [(15.6+-2.5) pg/ml, 3 h(10.4+-5.3) pg/ml, 6 h (9.3+-1.4) pg/ml, 12 h(11.0+-2.7) pg/ml] were significantly decreased, so were the TM level at 6 h (1.6+-0.9) ng/ml, and the @GENE_SERPINC1 @GENE_304917 @@@AT-III@@@ levels at 1 h[(190.3+-29.2) mug/ml],6 h [(104.4+-33.6) mug/ml] and 12 h [(73.6+-39.0) mug/ml, P<0.05].

citations.NLM: Lyu XC, Cai GL, Xu QH, Hu CB, Yan ML, Zhang HH. [Endothelial protective effect of simvastatin on coagulation system in septic rats]. Zhonghua Nei Ke Za Zhi. 2020 Jan 1;59(1):52-57. PMID: 31887837
citations.BibTeX: @article{31887837, title={[Endothelial protective effect of simvastatin on coagulation system in septic rats].}, author={Lyu XC and Cai GL and Xu QH and Hu CB and Yan ML and Zhang HH}, journal={Zhonghua Nei Ke Za Zhi}, volume={59}, number={1}, pages={52-57}}

results.title: Simvastatin Prevents Long-Term Cognitive Deficits in Sepsis Survivor Rats by Reducing Neuroinflammation and Neurodegeneration.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Prevents Long-Term @DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@Cognitive Deficits@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Sepsis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@Sepsis@@@ Survivor @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@ by Reducing @DISEASE_Neuroinflammatory_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D000090862 @@@Neuroinflammation@@@ and @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@Neurodegeneration@@@.
